name: backend

scripts.reset:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test dotenv -e .env.test -- npx prisma migrate reset --force
scripts.migrate:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test dotenv -e .env.test -- npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.test: npm run reset:test && npm run migrate:test && cross-env NODE_ENV=test NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules dotenv -e .env.test -- jest
scripts.reset:linux: cross-env DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.linux NODE_ENV=development npx prisma migrate reset --force
scripts.migrate:linux: DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.linux NODE_ENV=development npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.reset:test:linux: cross-env NODE_ENV=test env-cmd -f .env.linux.test npx prisma migrate reset --force
scripts.migrate:test:linux: cross-env NODE_ENV=test env-cmd -f .env.linux.test npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.test:linux: npm run reset:test:linux && npm run migrate:test:linux && cross-env NODE_ENV=test NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules env-cmd -f .env.linux.test jest --config jest.config.mjs
